Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pDim
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: dimension name (if a dim:hier tuple is supplied then the hierarchy parameter will be ignored)

Parameters.Name: pHier
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: hierarchy name (if blank assume same named hierarchy. delimited dim:hier can also be passed in the dimension parameter)

Parameters.Name: pOverwrite
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Overwrite Existing public subset with same name? (Boolean 1=Yes)
